starting_village.name: Starting Village
starting_village.description: A peaceful village where new adventurers begin their journey. The innkeeper serves warm meals and merchants offer basic equipment.

forest_path.name: Dark Forest
forest_path.description: A dense forest filled with twisted trees and mysterious shadows. Strange sounds echo through the undergrowth.

deep_woods.name: Deep Woods
deep_woods.description: The heart of the forest where ancient magic still lingers. Dangerous creatures prowl these shadows.

ancient_ruins.name: Ancient Ruins
ancient_ruins.description: Remnants of a forgotten civilization. These crumbling structures hold both treasure and peril.

underground_tombs.name: Underground Tombs
underground_tombs.description: Hidden beneath the ruins, ancient burial chambers guarded by undead warriors.

crystal_caves.name: Crystal Caves
crystal_caves.description: Glowing crystals illuminate these caverns, but dangerous elementals guard their secrets.

dragon_lair.name: Dragon's Lair
dragon_lair.description: The ultimate challenge awaits. A mighty Fire Dragon has made these mountains its home.

moonlit_glade.name: Moonlit Glade
moonlit_glade.description: A serene clearing bathed in silvery moonlight. Strange magic permeates the air here.

spire_of_sorcery.name: Spire of Sorcery
spire_of_sorcery.description: An arcane tower crackling with magical energy. Only the most skilled mages can survive here.

obsidian_temple.name: Obsidian Temple
obsidian_temple.description: A dark temple of unknown purpose, hewn from black obsidian stone.

void_cavern.name: Void Cavern
void_cavern.description: A cavernous expanse where light itself seems to bend. Ancient power dwells here.

abyss_gate.name: Abyss Gate
abyss_gate.description: A gateway to the void itself. The very fabric of reality feels unstable.

tavern.name: The Rusty Tankard
tavern.description: A warm tavern in the heart of the town. Adventurers meet here to swap stories and hire companions.

swamp_of_shadows.name: Swamp of Shadows
swamp_of_shadows.description: A treacherous marsh shrouded in perpetual mist. The foul waters hide many dangerous creatures.

haunted_cemetery.name: Haunted Cemetery
haunted_cemetery.description: An ancient burial ground where restless spirits roam among crumbling tombstones.

thunder_peak.name: Thunder Peak
thunder_peak.description: A towering mountain peak perpetually shrouded in storm clouds. Lightning strikes constantly.

crypt_of_eternity.name: Crypt of Eternity
crypt_of_eternity.description: A vast underground necropolis where the most powerful undead dwell in eternal darkness.

hellfire_citadel.name: Hellfire Citadel
hellfire_citadel.description: A fortress of black stone floating in a sea of flames. Demons patrol its corridors.

sky_sanctuary.name: Sky Sanctuary
sky_sanctuary.description: A mystical floating island in the heavens, home to the most ancient and powerful creatures.

mountain_base.name: Mountain Base
mountain_base.description: The foot of the great mountain where adventurers prepare for the ascent.

port_lesben.name: Port Lesbèn
port_lesben.description: A bustling port town where ships set sail for distant lands. The salt air is thick with the cries of gulls and sailors.

port_urkilsh.name: Port Ûrk'ilsh
port_urkilsh.description: A rugged northern port, the gateway to the frozen reaches of the continent.

elmenburg.name: Ëlmenburg
elmenburg.description: A majestic city built into the side of a mountain, known for its fine craftsmanship and ancient history.

lenbenburg.name: Lenbënburg
lenbenburg.description: The capital of the northern provinces, a fortress city that has never fallen to any foe.

outskirts_lenbenburg.name: Outskirts of Lenbënburg
outskirts_lenbenburg.description: The rolling hills and farmlands surrounding the capital, currently plagued by roaming monsters.

albeitirt_peak.name: Albéitirt Peak
albeitirt_peak.description: A jagged peak that pierces the clouds. Legend says an ancient power rests at its summit.

windswept_flower_valley.name: Windswept flower valley
windswept_flower_valley.description: A beautiful valley filled with vibrant flowers that dance in the constant, gentle breeze.

whispering_canyon.name: Whispering Canyon
whispering_canyon.description: A narrow canyon where the wind creates eerie, whisper-like sounds against the stone walls.

forgotten_oasis.name: Forgotten Oasis
forgotten_oasis.description: A hidden sanctuary in the desert, with crystal clear water and lush palm trees.

desert_of_aukrahama.name: Desert of Aukrahama
desert_of_aukrahama.description: A vast, arid desert where scorching winds and shifting sands make travel perilous.

outlaw_lands_of_bridagrak_oblast.name: Outlaw Lands of Brïdagrak Oblast
outlaw_lands_of_bridagrak_oblast.description: A lawless region where bandits and mercenaries vie for control. Danger lurks around every corner.

port_nova_terrabla.name: Port Nova Terrabla
port_nova_terrabla.description: A vibrant port city known for its exotic goods and diverse population. Adventurers gather here before setting sail towards the continent of Yixuan.

port_lianghai.name: Port Liãnghǎi
port_lianghai.description: A bustling harbor city on the eastern coast of the continent of Yixuan, known for its seafood markets and skilled shipbuilders. From here, adventurers can embark on voyages to distant lands across the sea.

temple_of_eternity.name: Temple of Eternity
temple_of_eternity.description: An ancient temple dedicated to the gods of old, filled with puzzles and guardians protecting sacred treasures.

bamboo_forest.name: Misty Bamboo Forest
bamboo_forest.description: A serene forest of towering bamboo where ancient martial artists train. The mist conceals many secrets.

sacred_lake.name: Lake of Reflection
sacred_lake.description: A mystical lake with crystal-clear waters said to hold visions of the future. Ancient dragon turtles inhabit its depths.

dragon_temple.name: Celestial Dragon Temple
dragon_temple.description: A magnificent temple floating among the clouds, home to celestial dragons and their disciples.

thunder_mountain.name: Shattered Peaks
thunder_mountain.description: A range of jagged mountains constantly shrouded in thunderstorms. Lightning elementals roam freely.

crystal_palace.name: Crystal Palace of Yixuan
crystal_palace.description: A magnificent palace made entirely of crystal, where the emperor holds court. Glittering treasures abound.

floating_islands.name: Floating Isles of Paradise
floating_islands.description: Magical islands that float in the sky, connected by bridges of light. Home to wise sages and celestial beings.

ancient_battlefield.name: Fields of Eternal Battle
ancient_battlefield.description: A ancient battlefield where spirits of fallen warriors still fight their eternal war.

forbidden_city.name: Forbidden City of Shadows
forbidden_city.description: A city consumed by darkness, where forbidden magic was practiced. Dangerous shadows lurk in every corner.

paradise_garden.name: Garden of Eternal Blossoms
paradise_garden.description: A paradise filled with flowers that never wilt. Peaceful creatures and spirits dwell here.

paradise_sanctum.name: Sanctum of Enlightenment
paradise_sanctum.description: The highest sanctuary in Yixuan where masters seek enlightenment. The final test for true heroes.

paradise_summit.name: Summit of the Immortals
paradise_summit.description: The highest peak in Yixuan where immortal warriors train. Only the strongest may reach this place.

shadow_realm.name: Realm of Eternal Night
shadow_realm.description: A dimension of perpetual darkness where shadows hold power. Only the bravest venture here.

void_gateway.name: Gateway to the Void
void_gateway.description: A portal to the void itself. The boundary between worlds grows thin here.

true_void.name: The True Void
true_void.description: Beyond all dimensions, where even light fears to tread. The ultimate challenge awaits.

heavenly_gate.name: Heavenly Gate
heavenly_gate.description: The gateway to the celestial realm where gods reside. The final destination for worthy heroes.

celestial_realm.name: Celestial Realm
celestial_realm.description: The realm of the gods, a place of eternal beauty and power. Those who reach here are legends.

golden_temple.name: Golden Temple of Wealth
golden_temple.description: A magnificent temple made of gold and jewels, guarded by the legendary Golden Guardians.

mountain_treasury.name: Hidden Treasury
mountain_treasury.description: A vast underground treasury filled with the accumulated wealth of countless dynasties.
